GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
fs: don't audit the capability check in simple_xattr_list()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit aa5f2912bb2e17c952d223212f792b000302c26c, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit 38f38657444d15e1a8574eae80ed3de9f501737a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: fs: don't audit the capability check in simple_xattr_list()
